1370: Eremboldus was born in Die Camp in 1370.
Got married to Marcibilia at age 21 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Marcibilia, Lambrecht, at age 22.
1373: Had a son with Marcibilia, Gerart, at age 24.
1374: Had a son with Marcibilia, Herman, at age 25.
1376: Had a daughter with Marcibilia, Douwen, at age 27.
1377: Had a daughter with Marcibilia, Brundonis, at age 28.
1380: Had a son with Marcibilia, Geldmaro, at age 31.
Lost son Geldmaro when Geldmaro was 1 years old.
1381: Had a son with Marcibilia, Ysewin, at age 32.
1384: Had a son with Marcibilia, Lieuin, at age 35.
1385: Lost son Lambrecht when Lambrecht was 15 years old.
1391: Lost daughter Douwen when Douwen was 15 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1392: Lost son Herman when Herman was 19 years old.
